title: Single-page romantic Rose Day website for Keerti with dreamy animations

requirements.text: Build a single-page romantic ‚Äúdigital love letter‚Äù website dedicated to Keerti, with a dreamy pastel aesthetic and a centered hero composition.

quotes: Create a single-page romantic website dedicated to my girlfriend.

acceptanceCriteria: The app renders as a single-page experience (no required navigation) with one primary vertically-stacked layout: background + centered hero + headline/subtitle + footer.
Visual style is consistently romantic/dreamy/soft/pastel across all sections (no default template look).

requirements.text: Implement a soft dreamy gradient background using blush pink, peach, cream, and warm golden tones, with subtle animated overlays (sparkles, glowing dust particles, and light bokeh) drifting slowly to create a magical atmosphere.

quotes: A soft dreamy gradient background using blush pink, peach, cream, and warm golden tones. Subtle animated sparkles, glowing dust particles, and light bokeh effects floating slowly across the page

acceptanceCriteria: Background shows a multi-stop gradient in the specified warm/pastel palette and fills the full viewport height.
At least three distinct overlay animation layers are visible (sparkles + dust + bokeh) and move slowly without distracting jitter.
Animations perform smoothly on typical laptop/mobile screens (no obvious stutter) and do not block scrolling/interactions.

requirements.text: Create a center-focused hero section featuring a romantic illustration/visual of a hand gently offering a deep red rose to a smiling girl (Keerti) accepting it, with a gentle glow around the hands/rose and floating rose petals for elegance.

quotes: A beautiful romantic illustration or visual showing a hand gently offering a deep red rose. A girl named Keerti is smiling warmly as she accepts the rose. ... Gentle glow around the hands and rose. Floating rose petals add elegance.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero visual is prominently centered and clearly depicts the described rose-offering moment (hand offering deep red rose; Keerti accepting; warm smile).
A subtle glow effect is visible around the hands/rose area.
Floating rose petals are visible in/around the hero area and animate gently (slow drift).

Subtitle text matches exactly and uses a readable elegant font distinct from the headline.
Text contrast remains readable against the animated background on desktop and mobile sizes.

requirements.text: Add additional romantic motion effects: smooth fade-in animations for hero/text on initial load, gentle shimmer/glow emphasis around important text, and soft heart/rose petal animations that appear or intensify as the user scrolls.

quotes: Soft heart or rose petal animations on scroll
Gentle glow or shimmer effect around important text

acceptanceCriteria: On page load, hero and text fade/slide in smoothly (no abrupt pop-in).
Headline has a subtle shimmer or pulsing glow effect that remains tasteful and not overly bright.
When scrolling, additional heart/petal elements animate in a noticeable but soft way (e.g., more petals drift, or hearts appear briefly).

requirements.text: Define and apply a coherent visual theme system (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that consistently delivers a romantic, dreamy, elegant pastel look across the page (avoid blue/purple-dominant palettes).

quotes: Romantic, dreamy, emotional, magical, elegant, soft, pastel love aesthetic.

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent palette using blush/peach/cream/warm gold is applied to background, text accents, and decorative elements.
Typography pairing feels handwritten + elegant, and is applied consistently (headline vs subtitle vs footer).
No section uses an unrelated default theme; overall presentation looks intentionally designed for the romantic love-letter mood.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets required for the hero illustration and (optionally) subtle texture overlays, stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them directly from the frontend (do not route images through the backend).

quotes: A beautiful romantic illustration or visual...

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the page via static paths.
Hero uses the generated hero illustration image as its main visual.
No backend endpoints are used for serving these images.

constraints: Frontend must not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed by the system.
Backend must remain single-actor architecture; only add backend work if strictly necessary for this single-page site.
nonGoals: User accounts, Internet Identity login flows, or personalization beyond the hardcoded Keerti/Rose Day content.
Multi-page routing, admin panels, or content management.
External integrations (social APIs, email, real-time chat).
